name: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver
descr:
As Raziel, stalk the shadows of Nosgoth preying upon your former vampire brethren in your quest to destroy your creator- Kain. After being betrayed and executed by Kain, return to Nosgoth on an epic mission of revenge. A milestone in 3D adventure.[h2]Key Features:[/h2][list][li]Feed on the souls of your enemies
[/li][li]Explore the vast 3D world of Nosgoth packed with 60 hours of gameplay
[/li][li]Shift real-time between the material and the spectral planes
[/li][li]Hunt 5 different tribes of murderous vampires with an arsenal of deadly hand-to-hand, projectile and environmental weapons.
[/li][li]Over 100 cinematics with 45 minutes of voice over deliver a dark, gothic story[/li][/list]
